articles.title: Joe Biden Calls Lifting Of Indoor Mask Rule "Great Day" - NDTV
articles.description: President Joe Biden told Americans on Thursday that the lifting of the rule on indoor mask wearing was "a great day" in the fight against Covid-19 and that they could now "smile again."
articles.content:
Biden implored those yet to be completely vaccinated to keep wearing masks for now.

articles.title: TV giant Ellen DeGeneres to end her long-running talk show - New Straits Times
articles.description: NEW YORK: Ellen DeGeneres, a star of daytime American talk show culture, on Wednesday said she was calling it quits after 19 seasons anchoring a TV staple that had become tainted by toxic workplace allegations.
